p: Ledol ( 3) was identified in a fraction eluted with hexane/ethyl acetate 90:10, also containing guaiol ( 6). The fraction was analysed by GC(RI), where the two sesquiterpenoids were separated and identified by comparison of their LRIs and EIMS spectra to those of the literature [ 27] and to the reference sample isolated from the EO of L. heteromorpha.
